<h3 id="X22115">X(22115) = MIDPOINT OF X(186) AND X(323)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4 (a^2-b^2-c^2) (a^2-b^2-b c-c^2) (a^2-b^2+b c-c^2) : :
<b><br>
